name: punch_click_pro_api
description: The backend API created for an employee arrival registration system allows workers to clock in and out by entering a unique code. It records the time and date of each employee's clock in and out. It provides an efficient and secure way to manage employee attendance control in real-time. Ensures accurate tracking of punctuality and hours worked by each employee. It offers a robust interface for data communication between the frontend and the database.
author: luiseduardofrias
